answers.answer:
Jawaban:

curlier

Penjelasan:

Comparative (Perbandingan)

Kata kunci perbandingan itu ada di kata "than",yang artinya daripada. Bentuk comparative dari curly adalah curlier (kalau diakhiri dengan y, ganti y dengan i lalu tambah er). Semoga membantu!

2. My mother has a son, he is my

He is ... a horse​

1. He opens the door    2.We set the tbale 
3.The pays a lot of money
4.I draw a picture
5.They wear blue shoes
6.They don't help you

8.You do not write the letter

ubah ke exercise on passive voice
bantu jawab ya​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

1. The door is opened by him.

2. The table is set by us.

3. A lot of money is paid by them.

4. A picture is drawn by me.

5. Blue shoes are worn by them.

6. You are not helped by them.

7. The book is not opened by him.

8. The letter is not written by you.

related_questions.question: Jelaskan apa yang dimaksud dengan variabel?​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

Variabel atau peubah dapat mengacu pada: Variabel (matematika), sebuah simbol yang melambangkan suatu kuantitas dalam suatu ekspresi matematika, serta sering digunakan dalam berbagai bidang ilmu pengetahuan. Variabel (ilmu komputer), suatu nama simbolis yang memiliki nilai dan nilainya bisa diubah-ubah

Jawaban:

Variabel merupakan salah satu komponen penting yang dibutuhkan peneliti dalam sebuah penelitian. Variabel mencakup segala sesuatu yang ditetapkan untuk mendapatkan informasi mengenai hal tersebut hingga bisa ditarik kesimpulannya.

Penjelasan:

semoga membantu

 B : she ... got influenza

7. AGA : Vino, can you help me fix my computer?    VINO: I'd love to, but today my schedule is full. What about tomorrow?
From the conversation, we know that ...
A. Vino cannot help Aga.
C. Vino refuses to help Aga.
B. Vino will fix Aga's computer today D. Vino will fix Aga's computer tomorrow​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

Jawabannya adalah D. Vino will fix Aga's computer tomorrow

Jawaban:

D. Vino will fix Aga's coputer tomorrow

Thanyou <3

related_questions.question:
Anton,_____, passed away yesterday morning    a. to whom I talked last week
b. to which I talked last week
c. to who I talked last week
d. to whose I talked last week
e. to where I talked last week
​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

a) to whom I talked last week

Penjelasan:

kita pakai relative clause whom saat membicarakan object di sebuah kalimat:

- kata 'I' merupakan subject karena 'I' berada di belakang verb 'talked', artinya yang berbicara itu saya

- sedangkan kata 'Anton' disini adalah object menunjukkan kepada siapa saya berbicara

related_questions.question:
4. The best arrangement of these jumbled sentences to be a good recount text is....    a. Finally I went home with my friends happily.
b.After swimming, I put on again my bathing suit and go to the bathroom to rinse my body.
c. Yesterday I went to swimming pool with my friends.
d.I brought my bag which is full of things I needed in the swimming pool.
e.I wore my clothes and put all the wet clothes into the plastic bag, so my bag would not get wet by water.
f. When we arrived there, I changed my clothes into swimsuit then I did a little warming up before I got into the pool.
A. C-d-f-e-b-a
B. a-c-b-d-f-e
C. d-c-b-f-a-e-
D. b-d-a-f-e-​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

c-d-f-b-e-a

Penjelasan: i can't find any correct answer from the option. so, i make one of mine. hope this find you helpful ^•^
